title: Daddy, Mommy Is Not Available - Novel Updates
tags: Abusive Characters   Betrayal   Character Growth   Cute Children   Divorce   Female Protagonist   Modern Day   Twins
author: 唐三小姐
description: After they have been married for 3 years, Bo Yehan forced her to sign the divorce agreement for the sake of her sister. 6 years later, she came back with twins. She desired a peaceful life but was pestered by her former domineering husband. “Daddy, mommy is not available, you have to wait!””My daddy is not you!” Since he could not win over the children, he then turned to her. In the deep night, he pressed her against the wall corner...>
